ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- was Re: AC
ygData.msgSnippet: Compared to what it was - yes, I guess so but I spent 8 hours yesterday in Sebilis with a full group (granted there were 2 54 s, another who became 54, 1 53, 1
ygData.messageBody:
Compared to what it was - yes, I guess so but I spent 8 hours yesterday in
Sebilis with a full group (granted there were 2 54's, another who became 54,
1 53, 1 52 and me 51) for 1 bubble of exp. (sigh) We cleared our way in
past "the pyramid" and camped the 4 named spawn spots and the Emperor's
guard's and the Emperor (who must be the one with no clothes or armor
because I have fought tougher blues than this guy who somehow is level 60 -
Infectious Cloud? don;t make me sneeze!)

We got some spells and some weps and some armor and a visit from a guide.
"Hey do you guys need a key to open that door?" We were using a a rogue to
pick it. Wonder if a nerf for the door and a buff for the Emp will be in
today's patch. We were in Seb from 1pm central time until 9pm and were the
only group in the place.

When we broke in, we cleared to the first bridge and were fighting a froog
when a Shroom (myconid warrior? reever?) appeared out of nowhere. He got
messed and we kept fighting. Then another shroom. And another, and another
and we ran back to the zone for ease of CR. Some managed to camp out,
cleric gated, a few died inc me. But my question is - what causes these
Shrooms to agro? This is the second time I have seen this in this same spot
with about the same results. And we were careful not to use an AE - just
doing the normal kill froog thing. Anyone know? Anyone been to the lower
levels in Seb?

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 24, 2000 11:26 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: AC


> and isn't the new exp in kunark dungeons just dreamy? =) big noticeable
> difference.
>
> Shada Powa, L54 Wood Elf Minstrel
